Looking for a Samsung Galaxy S8 front-facing camera replacement? If you dropped your Samsung Galaxy S8 and broke the front-facing camera it can be repaired!

You can replace your broken Samsung Galaxy S8 front-facing camera using our high-quality replacement part. Don't hesitate to contact our support team for any questions or concerns.

This part includes the Galaxy S8 front-facing camera and flex cable.

Lifetime Warranty

The Samsung Galaxy S8 front-facing camera come with a lifetime warranty, as the other Samsung Replacement Parts.

Part Type Samsung Front Facing Camera
Compatible Model Samsung Galaxy S8
Manufacturer Unlockr Parts
Warranty Lifetime Warranty

entry.title: Samsung Galaxy S8 Battery
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck Battery
Type: Battery
Price: 19.99

You have a Samsung S8 that no longer holds a charge the way it did when it was new?

Your Samsung Galaxy S8 shuts down unexpectedly ?

Your cell phone only works when the battery is plugged in ?

Those are common symptoms that a defective battery will have.

It is time to get a new Samsung S8 replacement battery.

The old battery in your cell phone can outgrow inside and damage the internals.

The OEM Batteries for Samsung Galaxy S8 are brand-new batteries coming directly from our manufacturer. They are custom built for customers who demand the same quality as original Samsung batteries. 

  • Verified 95% Capacity
  • Zero cycle count
  • Tested under extreme weather
  • No wrapping for a better fit
  • High output current capacity
  • 1 Year Warranty

Compatibility

This battery is only compatible with a Samsung Galaxy S8.

Warranty

The Replacement Samsung Galaxy S8 Battery comes with 1 year warranty, as the other Samsung Battery Replacement Parts.

Part Type Samsung Battery
Compatible Model Galaxy S8 (5.8")
Model Number G950W
Manufacturer Unlockr
Warranty 1 Year Warranty

Looking for a Samsung S8 screen replacement? If you dropped your Samsung Galaxy S8 and broke the front glass it can be repaired! You can replace your broken Samsung screen using our high-quality replacement part. Don't hesitate to contact our support team for any questions or concerns.

The OEM Screens for Samsung Galaxy S8 LCD Screens and Digitizers has components from original screens. For customers who demand the same standard as original repair parts, the OEM Samsung parts have you covered.

  • OEM AMOLED LCD & Digitizer Assembly
  • OEM Touch Digitizer and IC
  • OEM Glass Lens
  • OEM Backlight
  • OEM Flex Cable
  • Lifetime Warranty
